DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance advance feature , implement PARADYM ICD Platform offer single chamber ( VR - model 8250 ) , dual Chamber ( DR - 8550 ) Cardiac Resynchronization System defibrillation capability ( PARADYM CRT System , model 8750 ) general ICD population .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Status Monitoring Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator ( ICD ) Patients Physiological Diagnosis ( PhD ) Function
DOC.detailed_description: The study particularly focus new sensor-based diagnostic feature , call PhD-Clinical Status ( PhD ) . A dedicated PhD screen show trend patient ' ventilation level rest ( MVR ) effort ( MVE ) , correspond level activity , day-by-day , period 6 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient eligible implantation ICD CRTD device accord current available guideline . 2 . Documented chronic HF ( NYHA Class II IV ) time enrollment 3 . Scheduled implant PARADYM ICD / CRTD implant within previous month 4 . Signed date informed consent 1 . Any contraindication ICD therapy 2 . Abdominal implantation site 3 . Acute myocarditis 4 . Unstable coronary symptom ( unstable angina myocardial infarction ) within last month 5 . Planned heart transplant 6 . Mechanical tricuspid valve 7 . Unable perform 6 minute Walking Test time enrollment 8 . Already include another clinical study 9 . Life expectancy le 13 month 10 . Inability understand purpose study refusal cooperate 11 . Inability refusal provide inform consent 12 . Under guardianship 13 . Age le 18 year 14 . Pregnancy ( Women childbearing potential negative pregnancy test prior enrollment )
DOC.keyword: The study particularly focus new-based diagnostic feature , call PhD-Clinical Status ( PhD )
